# Individual workouts


```{r echo=FALSE}
log_df = read.csv(PLOG_PATH)
dates = sort(as.factor(unique(log_df$DATE)), decreasing=T)
src <-lapply(dates, function(d) knit_expand("_template_workout.Rmd"))
```

`r knit(text = unlist(src))`
